Comments_List: My ability to read Japanese and have open discussions about various topics. I also improved my vocabulary and ability to write.
I improved my Japanese writing, speaking, grammar, and vocabulary.
Great Japanese class! I learned a lot
The course is well facilitated and the lessons are well thought out. There isn't anything that I would change!

I liked the variety of reading/viewing material we were assigned (stories, poems, cartoons, dramas, etc.). I think the main difficulties with this course stem from the fact that the students have varying skill/experience levels and come from very different programs and backgrounds. Thus some students were okay with the difficult and amount of work assigned, but I think some students might have felt a bit overwhelmed at times. It's hard to find a balance.
I would highly recommend this course to anyone who wants to improve their Japanese. The readings and assignment are very interesting!
I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to continue studying Japanese and has the necessary background.
Yes for higher level Japanese learners!
